hooks.command: echo "$ARGUMENTS" | jq -r '.command' | grep -Eo -- '-m[[:space:]]+"[^"]+"' | sed 's/-m[[:space:]]*"\(.*\)"/\1/' | grep -Eq '^(feat|fix|refactor|test|docs|chore)\([a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\): .+' || (echo '‚ùå Commit message does not follow the required format: <type>(<scope>): <summary>' && exit 1)
